benchmark_details.name: WiserUI-Bench (Pairwise UI/UX Design Understanding Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: WiserUI-Bench is a novel benchmark for assessing modelsâ€™ multimodal understanding of UI/UX design, featuring 300 real-world UI image pairs along with expert-curated rationales to evaluate models' effectiveness in predicting user engagement and explaining design choices.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate multimodal understanding of how UI/UX design influences user behavior and decision-making.

data.source: 300 UI image pairs sourced from industry-validated A/B testing data, collected from widely recognized testing platforms.
data.annotation: Expert-curated rationales created by UI/UX professionals through a multi-stage review process.

methodology.calculation: Model performance is calculated based on selecting the correct UI/UX design that drives user behavior.
methodology.interpretation: Performance indicates the model's ability to reason about design effectiveness based on user behavior indicators.
methodology.validation: The benchmark is validated against real-world A/B testing data.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data was used under ethical guidelines, ensuring anonymization of participants and expert annotations.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent was obtained from all expert annotators and survey participants.
